Actions.Name: Execute SQL Select
Actions.Params: tableNames="depr";sqlBody="select year(p.BeginDate) Year, month(p.BeginDate) Month, p.Type, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_DebitQty),0) AS DebitQty, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_CreditQty),0) AS CreditQty, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_AcquisitionCost),0) AcquisitionCost, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_StdDepreciationValueReversed),0) StdDepreciationValueReversed, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_StandardDepreciationValue),0) StandardDepreciationValue, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_IASRevaluationValue),0) IASRevaluationValue, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_InfoReverseDeprDiffs),0) InfoReverseDeprDiffs, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_InformativeDepreciationValue),0) InformativeDepreciationValue, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_CostOfGoodsSold + v.ESFIItemPeriodics_CostOfGoodsOtherwiseDispensed + v.ESFIItemPeriodics_CostOfGoodsSelfDispensed + v.ESFIItemPeriodics_CostOfGoodsConsumed),0) AS KostosEx, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_AdditionalDepreciationValue),0) AS AdditionalDepreciationValue, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_IdlenessDepreciationValue),0) AS IdlenessDepreciationValue, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_AlternativeDepreciationValue),0) AS AlternativeDepreciationValue, isnull(sum(v.ESFIItemPeriodics_AltReverseDeprDiffs),0) AS AltReverseDeprDiffs from ESFIItemEntry_ESFIItemPeriodics v left join ESGOFiscalPeriod p on v.fFiscalPeriodGID = p.GID where v.fDepreciationItemGID = @vDepr1 group by year(p.BeginDate), month(p.BeginDate), p.Type";sqlParameterNames="vDepr1"

Actions.Name: Set Column Value In Heap
Actions.Description: Set Column Value In Heap vDepr1
